items.title: Attack on Kyiv shows 'Russia doesn't want peace', Zelensky says
items.description: The 10-hour missile and drone barrage directed at Ukraine's capital killed two people and left 32 injured, local authorities say.

items.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
items.description: Trump tells Politico he ordered the strikes as "a Christmas present" - contradicting a statement by Nigerian officials.

items.title: New York blanketed in snow, sparking travel chaos
items.description: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled and more than 3,000 were delayed by the winter storm.

items.title: Nine arrested in Italy for allegedly raising millions for Hamas
items.description: Police say the suspects raised around €7m (£6m) for the militant group over more than two years.

items.title: Thailand-Cambodia ceasefire begins after weeks of deadly clashes
items.description: Almost one million people were displaced when hostilities resumed earlier this month after the first truce broke.
